entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Cornwall
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:38 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning early this evening then changing to flurries at times heavy later this evening and ending this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 60 early this evening then diminishing to 20 overnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clearing. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
